content: get through wednesday with this color-blocked sweater vest this vest knits up quickly using intarsia techniques and is suitable for beginners pattern is written in sizes small medium large xl and xxl but is easily scaled up or down using a bit of math finished measurements small 18 inches across 21 inches tall laid flat medium 20 inches across 21 inches tall laid flat large 22 inches across 23 inches tall laid flat xl 24 inches across 26 inches tall laid flat xxl 26 inches across 26 inches tall laid flat suggested yarn is an alpaca/acrylic blend worsted weight yarn but any worsted weight yarn will work yardage 200 500 yards in color a white in the sample 400 650 in color b black in the sample note this pattern requires working with four skeins at a time two in each color you can manually split a skein in half the sample for this pattern was knit in size large and used about two and a half skeins of lion brand s touch of alapaca yarn in black and just under two skeins of yarn bee s alapaca twist in white
